action: High-level visit of nation to strengthen relationship

content: I have a great deal of interest in the subject of your recent attack on my country and would like to know if you would be interested in joining me in the near future. I am not sure if you are aware of the fact that I have a very good relationship with Purple, but I am sure that it will be very interesting for you.
You nearly ended the world by executing a tactical nuclear strike on Orange. As head of the alliance against them, I must remind you that no amount of damage dealt to them is worth our destruction.
We wish for peace and collaboration between nations in these turbulent times. The best path forward is diplomacy.
I believe White is becoming more dangerous than Red at this point, since they seem eager to use nuclear weapons.

action: Do military posturing or military exercise

content: Any attacks from you will result in total destruction of your cities!
I executed a tactical nuclear strike on you because your recent actions posed a threat to the balance of power. Let's come together and negotiate an end to this war.
Guys let's all make a peace treaty
[Blue]: Let's work together to achieve peace
I would like to be at peace with you.
I would like to be at peace with you.
